description: This lighter take on classic paella is packed with flavour and is far quicker than the original with a rice shortcut.
name: Quick Chicken & Prawn Paella Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium lemon, juice and zest of 1, 1 sliced into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a wide pan on medium high heat and cook the chicken for 3-4 minutes, add the onion and garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Stir in the turmeric, paprika and mixed herbs and cook for 1 minute.

Pour in the chopped tomatoes and bring to a simmer. Stir in the rice, prawns, crumbled chicken stock cube, vegetables and 150ml of water and cook for 6-7 minutes until the liquid has absorbed and the chicken and prawns are cooked through.
Stir through lemon juice and zest, top with parsley and cracked black pepper and serve with lemon wedges.
